task.summary: Created new example (diagonals) and added plots from old examples
Updated to include category names in output (tests need to be written)
Updated all tests with new changes
Modified network.py with regression changes and created mse_loss.py
Amended weighted_partitioner.py and moved files around
Added new mean_main.py example to test the regressional network
Added to examples and renamed package main to simulation
Renamed AbstractSimulator to AbstractLearner and simulation to learning
Updated for better layout of graph
Updated workflows to include the java-package branch
Created and finished circle.ipynb, and updated the Plotter class to allow for showing plots.

MESSAGE.value: Modified network.py with regression changes and created mse_loss.py
Amended weighted_partitioner.py and moved files around
Added new mean_main.py example to test the regressional network
Added to examples and renamed package main to simulation
Renamed AbstractSimulator to AbstractLearner and simulation to learning
Updated for better layout of graph
Updated workflows to include the java-package branch
Created and finished circle.ipynb, and updated the Plotter class to allow for showing plots.
